attributes.action: Declare Friday 30 April a national Bank Holiday in honour of the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: This would represent a significant and noted event which would serve as a permanent reminder to all the UK citizens of the true value of the NHS.
attributes.background: This special Bank Holiday should reflect a gesture of national importance, demonstrating to everyone in the UK the immense regard in which the National Health Service is held.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make the NHS anniversary a public holiday, starting with Monday 5th July 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330234
